algorithm_technique: Hashing substrings with a rolling hash to detect differences efficiently.
problem_summary_simple: Check if any two strings in a list differ by exactly one character at the same position.
problem_summary_technical: Uses rolling hash to efficiently compare substrings by removing one character at a time and checking for hash collisions.
key_insights: A rolling hash allows for O(1) computation of hashes for substrings when one character is removed.
By iterating through each character position and calculating hashes of strings with that character removed, we can detect differences.
